group_1.textRight: It seems today is the peak of the meteor shower.

group_1.textLeft: Is that right? I was not aware.

group_1.textRight: Compared to the village you can't see as many stars,
but even in the mountains of the city you can still@see them properly...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, hey, speaking of shooting stars, we gotta@come up with wishes!

group_1.textRight: I bet ya got all kindsa worldly desires, Charu!

group_1.textLeft: You say that, Ryouko-chan, just after making your@own wish earlier!

group_1.textRight: Well, nothin' wrong with a little world peace!

group_1.textLeft: I've been thinking about it for a while now, but I@haven't come up with a wish at all.

group_1.textRight: To us Diviners, wishing is an important matter.
Asahi-chan, what did you wish upon the stars?

group_1.textLeft: If it were to come true, I would somehow go back@to the day I became a Magical Girl
...And stop myself from making such a wish.

group_1.textRight: Was it... A wish you regret?

group_1.narration: "In days long gone, I loved being with people...@I used to go to a children's center to teach them how to@study, becoming an adviser for my acquaintances.@I was a positive influence in their lives."
"However, I hated people meddling in my personal life...@Even back then I had a troublesome personality."
"Wherein, perhaps because of my rebellious phase, I@hated the meddling that came from my grandfather..."
"And that is when I wished to Kyubey:@I wish grandfather would stop interfering with me..."
"But because of that wish, grandfather's father's war@memorial that was dedicated to him was demolished,@spiraling him into depression and falling ill..."
"Through a very indirect series of events,@it did come true..."

group_1.textCenter: I watched my grandfather break down, day by day.
I regret it so, so much...
And now...I know the reason why my grandfather@meddled with my life so much.
Even back then I wasn't foolish enough to not see@that I was loved.
Even so, I was so saddened that I couldn't help him.
...But I never imagined my wish would come true@in such a way.
...And as a result of those feelings of mourning,@my unique magic took shape.
So, if I were to make another wish as a Magical Girl...
Indeed, I would scold my old self.
That will never come true though.

group_1.textRight: How could he...@That's terrible of you, Kyūbē-sama...!
His interference― what were you doing?
Interfering...were you in love or something?!
Eh― l-l-love?!@You were in love...excuse me?!

group_1.textLeft: Y-you're wrong! It was nothing of the sort!

group_1.textRight: It was not my place to ask you so much...

group_1.textLeft: ...No, it was...my future after high school,@my school life, and then...

group_1.textRight: No matter what kind of great love it is,@I will absolutely not laugh!

group_1.textLeft: I told you this is not that kind of story...
...Um, my hobby is what he began meddling with.
